Title: Exempts from sales and use taxes motor vehicles and rolling stock used by common carriers
Summary: Exempts from sales and use taxes certain motor vehicles, parts and services therefor and railroad rolling stock, parts and services therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting certain motor vehicles, parts and services therefor and railroad rolling stock, parts and services therefor from the sales and use tax imposed by the state
